data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xu, Ye, Lu, Si-Han, Qin, Dao-Zheng (2015): Flaviata longa, a new species in Flaviata Lu & Qin and new synonymies in Empoasca (Matsumurasca) Anufriev (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Empoascini). Zootaxa 4027 (2): 296-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4027.2.9
